{# errorcheck #} // ERROR `syntax error: using not allowed in tag` // ERROR `syntax error: using not allowed in quoted attribute` // ERROR `syntax error: using not allowed in unquoted attribute` {% show this using []string %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected [, expecting identifier, macro or %}` {% show this using int %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected int, expecting string, html, css, js, json, markdown, macro or %}` {% var foo string %} {% show this using foo %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected foo, expecting string, html, css, js, json, markdown, macro or %}` {% show this foo %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected foo, expecting using` {% show; using %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting expression or using` {% show using int %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected int, expecting string, html, css, js, json, markdown or %}` {% show using macro %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected macro, expecting identifier or %}` {% show using; %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting %}` {% a += this; %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting using or %}` {% i++ using %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected using, expecting %}` {% f(this) foo %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected foo, expecting using or %}` {% f(this); %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting using or %}` {% c <- this; foo %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected semicolon, expecting using or %}` {% var a = this foo %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected foo, expecting using or %}`
